# NSCollectorDisabledOption

**Global Variable**

Specifies that the block is retained, and therefore ineligible for collection. Specifying this option is equivalent to invoking [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSGarbageCollector/disableCollectorForPointer:] with the returned block as the argument.

## Declaration

```swift
var NSCollectorDisabledOption: Int { get }
```

## Constants

- **NSScannedOption**: Specifies allocation of scanned memory.
title: NSCollectorDisabledOption
